00001 package newtonERP.viewers.secondStep;

00003 import modules.userRightModule.UserRightModule;
00004 import newtonERP.common.ActionLink;
00005 import newtonERP.common.ListModule;
00006 
00012 public class LinkViewer
00013 {
00014         private static int currentBalloonDivId = 0;
00015 
00020         public static String getHtmlCode(ActionLink actionLink)
00021         {
00022                 // String onClickConfirm = "";
00023 
00024                 int balloonDivId = getNextBalloonDivId();
00025 
00026                 /*
00027                  * todo: a remettre des que les viewer son plus generaliser que
00028                  * presentement if (isConfirm) if (action.getEntityUsable() == null)
00029                  * onClickConfirm = getOnClickConfirm(buttonCaption,"", value); else
00030                  * onClickConfirm = getOnClickConfirm(buttonCaption,
00031                  * action.getEntityUsable() .getVisibleInternalElementName(), value);
00032                  */
00033 
00034                 String html = "";
00035 
00036                 if (isPermissionAllowed(actionLink))
00037                 {
00038                         html += " <a href='"
00039                                         + actionLink.getUrlParam()
00040                                         + "' onmouseover='document.getElementById(\"balloon"
00041                                         + balloonDivId
00042                                         + "\").style.visibility=\"visible\"' onmouseout='document.getElementById(\"balloon"
00043                                         + balloonDivId + "\").style.visibility=\"hidden\"'>";
00044                         html += actionLink.getName() + "</a> ";
00045 
00046                         html += HelpViewer.getHtmlCode(actionLink, balloonDivId);
00047                 }
00048 
00049                 return html;
00050 
00051         }
00052 
00056         public static int getNextBalloonDivId()
00057         {
00058                 currentBalloonDivId++;
00059                 return currentBalloonDivId;
00060         }
00061 
00062         @SuppressWarnings("unused")
00063         // todo: retire lorsque la correction est aporter plus haut
00064         private static String getOnClickConfirm(String actionName,
00065                         String entityTypeName, String value)
00066         {
00067                 String html = "";
00068 
00069                 html += "onclick=\"return confirm(\'Voulez-vous vraiment ";
00070                 html += actionName + " ";
00071                 html += entityTypeName;
00072                 html += " " + value;
00073                 html += "?\')";
00074 
00075                 html += "\"";
00076 
00077                 return html;
00078         }
00079 
00080         private static boolean isPermissionAllowed(ActionLink actionLink)
00081 
00082         {
00083                 UserRightModule userRightModule = (UserRightModule) ListModule
00084                                 .getModule("UserRightModule");
00085 
00086                 return userRightModule.isPermissionAllowed(actionLink);
00087         }
00088 }
